name: My First Website - Workshop
tagline: Time to build your first website! :)
body:
### Yes, lets make a website! 

Some theory first. 

### So what is HTML?

HTML - Hyper Text Markup Language

### Enough with the theory, lets make a website! 
Download the zip file and unzip it.

Open index.html and paste the following: 

```html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
  
  </head>
  <body>
  
  </body>
</html>
```
 

To add a title to your website, add `<title> My Website </title>` in between the `head` tags
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
